mods.abstract: Four color window card (black, green, silver, and yellow on white) announcing the 1st Annual Nashville River Stages featuring the Foo-Fighters, Bobby Bare, Jr., Bonnie Raitt, Agents of Good Roots, Alisa Carroll, String Cheese Incident, Ben Folds Five, Medeski, Martin and Wood, Fairfield Four, Widespread Panic, Jolene, Delbert McClinton, Chumbawamba, Paula Cole, Ziggy Marley, Emmet Swimming, Lost Continentals, Keb Mo', Matraca Berg, Evinrudes, Chris Dicroce, Del McCoury Band, Jimmie Dale Gilmore, Steve Earle, Garrison Starr, Indigo Girls, The Honeyrods, Ronnie Earl and the Broadcasters, Link Wray, Owsley, Fastball Joe 90, and Alana Davis in Downtown Nashville, Tennessee on May 1-3. Poster features woodcuts of a microphone and the Nashville skyline.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
